issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Yarn node label CLI should parse "=" correctly when trying to remove all labels on a node

comments.body:
Hi [~wangda],
I took up this jira, hope you have not already started working on this ! If so please feel free to reassign.

Hi [~wangda],
Have uploaded a patch to fix this issue, please review

[~Naganarasimha]
Thanks for the patch looks good. 
Could you check the whitespace error
{noformat}
../patch/YARN-4654.v1.001.patch:63: trailing whitespace.

warning: 1 line adds whitespace errors.
{noformat}

Thanks [~bibinchundatt] for the comments,
Corrected the same in this patch !

This message was automatically generated.

Test case failures are either not related to the modifications in the patch and timed out ones are passing locally.
[~rohithsharma] can you take a look at this ?

Had an offline discussion with [~rohithsharma] and he was of the opinion that test case should fail when the modifications in *RMAdminCLI* is not present which was not happening in the patch. IIUC issue was not actually throwing a exception but intended behavior was not happening hence modified the test code to differ the behavior of CommonNodeLabelsManager when invalid NodeId is sent.

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |

YARN-4351 captures the test case failures for {{hadoop.yarn.client.TestGetGroups}} and other timed out testcases are also related to the build machine so i think the jenkins report is fine!, [~rohithsharma]/[~wangda], can one of you have a look at the latest patch ?
+1 for the latest patch. I will wait couple of days before committing it.
Tried this patch locally, works well for me, +1, thanks [~Naganarasimha]/[~rohithsharma].
committed to trunk/branch-2/branch-2.8.. thanks [~Naganarasimha] for your contributions and thanks [~leftnoteasy] for the review!!

FAILURE: Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #9320 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/9320/])
YARN-4654. Yarn node label CLI should parse "=" correctly when trying to (rohithsharmaks: rev c1afac3a98a4889d30a6ec7574a364fcbb6bb5b0)
